name: Sri Lankan Curry Powder
ingredients:
- 1 tbsp uncooked basmati rice
- 50g coriander seeds
- 25g cumin seeds
- 25g fennel seeds
- 7.5cm cinnamon stick
- 1.5 tsp fenugreek seeds
- 1/2 tsp cloves
- 1/2 tsp cardamom seeds
- 1 tsp black peppercorns
- 3 dried red kashmiri chillies
author: Rick Stein
instructions:
- Heat a dry, heavy-based frying pan over a medium heat
- Add the rice and shake the grains for about 3 minutes until golden brown
- Tip the rice out to cool and do the same to the spices, then the dried chillies
- Mix the rice, spices and chillies together and grind to a powder
